name: Funk night online
description:
Funk night online is a multiplayer rhythmical game where you need to press arrows to dance and battle different antagonists. It's basically like DDR, press arrow when arrow over other arrow. And uhhh don't die.

How to play:
- Tap arrows to follow the ryhthm, and defeat your opponents, that's all

Features:
- Multiplayer online mode
- Full 10 weeks
- Optimized perfomance
- Support buttons, hit box
- Story mode, free play
